CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Status , "NEW") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "NEU") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Assigned") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Escalated") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Eskaliert") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Opened") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Pending") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Under Review") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Notify HCP"),
IF( Indicator__c = TRUE, IMAGE("https://zimmerbiometglobal--c.na8.visual.force.com/resource/1433767941000/New", "New"), IMAGE("https://zimmerbiometglobal--c.na8.visual.force.com/resource/1433767918000/Checked","Seen"))
, IMAGE("https://zimmerbiometglobal--c.na8.visual.force.com/resource/1433767964000/Closed", "Closed"))
CustomField.label: Email Status
